extendedInfo.description: Does your phone always need charging, even once a day? Does your phone always die at crucial moment due to running out of battery? Want to find a perfect solution?Now is your answer!Over 20,000,000 downloads with 4.6 star rating.Easy Battery Saver is the easiest energy-saving application which helps you to extend your battery life and optimized your mobile hand-on experience. Easy Battery Saver is a powerful manager app specifically designed to extend battery life and optimize using habit.It saves your battery by intelligently dealing with phoneâs network connectivity, screen time out and screen brightness. Whatâs more, the considerable sleep schedule setting will save your battery when you are sleeping.Easy Battery Saver is easy to use by four preset saving modes and advanced customized mode. Select one mode, the problems will go away.1) General Saving Mode owns the basic network control, screen control and sleep schedule to meet your normal battery saving needs.2) Intelligent Saving Mode manage the eight different controls and smart to save more battery than general saving mode.3) Super Power Saving Mode adjusts your phone's standby time. You do not need  to worry about whether your phone dies at crucial moment.4) Advanced Customized Mode offers you more personalized options to allow Easy Battery Saver to manage applications and adjust system settings to optimize your battery efficiency.5) Normal Mode means  nothing change for your battery.Furthermore, tutorials in Easy Battery Saver will guide  you how to deal with multi-tasking and how to save your battery efficiency.No matter in what situation, no matter who you are. Easy Battery Saver will always find the best solution for you.Just stretch your finger, youâll find out the different.HIGHLIGHTS: - EASY TO USE* Optional modes that is easy to choose* Visualized battery status on main page- EFFECTIVE* Save more than 50% battery* Extend the battery working life- CONSIDERABLE* Battery consumption list of real-time running items* Simple, interactive and helpful tutorial* Notice of how to use battery betterLanguage Support------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Many Easy battery users would like to advise and translate English version to other minority languages. At present, we are looking for Easy Battery Saver users who can help.In particular, anyone who would like to help us with localization can join our collaborative translation platform  http://crowdin.net/project/easy-battery-saver We will acknowledge language translator on Google Play Description section. Easy Battery Saver team would like to appreciate your help and this would not happen without fans support. Finally, Easy Battery Saver thank you for all the fans being here. User Reviews: Saved my phone! I love this app! After the jelly bean update my battery wouldn't last half the day now it lasts all day! âAlyssa DoyenâBetter than Juice Defender on my previous Android phone, I used Juice Defender and I was very happy with it. When I got my captivate Juice Defender did not seem to be giving me the extra legs it did on my old phone. Easy Battery Saver helps maximize the battery for an entire day without needing Juice.â- Arthur RabinovitzâGreat I use to have no battery life on my phone but now itâs great.â-Josh WarrenKW: Battery, Battery Saver, Saver, Savior, Boost, Save, Drain, Juice Defender, Battery Booster, Easy,Charge,Best battery saverï¼power ,source , juice, extend battery life, battery indicator, free battery saver, battery life,baterÃ­a,bateri,à¤¬à¥à¤à¤°à¥,ceallraÃ­,à®ªà¯à®à¯à®à®°à®¿,Ð°ÐºÐºÑÐ¼ÑÐ»ÑÑÐ¾Ñ,batterie,Î¼ÏÎ±ÏÎ±ÏÎ¯Î±,bateria,çµæ± ,ççµ,çé»,é»æ± ï¼baterya,baterie,akku,"Ø¨Ø·Ø§Ø±ÙØ©,batterij, Ð±Ð°ÑÐµÑÐ¸Ñ,pil,à¹à¸à¸à¹à¸à¸­à¸£à¸µà¹,bateria,batteri,batÃ©rie,batteri,pin,Batterie,×Ö·×¦×Ö¼Öµ×¨,akkumulÃ¡tor,baterie,batteria,bateria,Ð°ÐºÑÐ¼ÑÐ»ÑÑÐ¾Ñ,batteri

reviews.title: Brilliant dashboard layout!
reviews.comment: This app runs smooth and is very simple to use. I love the dashboard layout.
reviews.author: Laeon Carter

reviews.title: Love this app. So easy to use
reviews.comment: Love this app. Easy to use and manage applications. Definitely extends battery
reviews.author: Sheila Swift

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This app is amazing. Even before the lastest update it improved my battery life significantly, but now it works twice as well it seems. The battery level percentage indicator is also very useful. Easy to use and configure or customise if you want to.
reviews.author: Ryan Foisy

reviews.title: Best bat app so far
reviews.comment: This battery apparently is simple and super user friendly. It has really increased my battery life. It helps me to easily manage my settings and to switch easily depending on my needs.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: The bestest app ever..its super cool..I love it..:)
reviews.author: Remruata Chhangte

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Really nice app guys. Best one one the play store. Really easy to use and it works very well. 5 star to this app and I highly suggest this app.
reviews.author: Nathaniel Soucy

reviews.title: Very cool
reviews.comment: Best aap so far, loving it. I was wondering if I have to leave android just because of its battery power. But this app help me out with a new wonderful experience
reviews.author: kuljit oberoi

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S4
reviews.comment: This app does what it says. No sugar coating. My s4 now can last more than a day even with the use of 4G network and playing high graphic games.   Thank you to the team who work hard fornthis app. I hope this simple rating would reach you guys. You are doong great. (07-02-2013)  I love this app so much that I decided to post again. Highly recommended. (08.29.2013)

reviews.title: Good one!
reviews.comment: Such a useful application. Enhance battery life time. Thanks for developer.
reviews.author: Watcharin Tongsuwan

reviews.title: Re:
reviews.comment: This App Is Real It Saved My Battery A Wholeeeeeeee Lot Before I Use This App My Battery Would Be 30% After School Now It\'s 70% Major Improvement Consider This The Best Battery App Improvement
reviews.author: Ty Jones

reviews.title: Good battery app
reviews.comment: Easy to use and advanced mode allows good customisation.   Descriptions could be a little clearer.
reviews.author: M Bassham

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Works very well and has nearly doubled my battery life, which is essential as I use my phone all day for voice, text and data!
reviews.author: Brian Ross

reviews.title: Extends your phone\'s performance!
reviews.comment: Can put it on a preset setting like Super Mode and pick what apps I want to have permission to use a data conn. and it does the rest opening and closing my data connection.  #1 app to install after you turn on a new phone-definitely extends the life of my phone. Thanks for this app it\'s a must have.
reviews.author: Jeremy Robinson

reviews.title: Brilliant app
reviews.comment: Have used this on HTC explorer n now on  Nexus 4 works just perfectly. Tried variety of apps when got the Nexus but nothing came close to this. I shouldn\'t have even tried anything but stuck to this app. Just keep up the grt work!!
reviews.author: Ramnath Acharya

reviews.title: It works.
reviews.comment: I really haven\'t done the tutorial, but anything that helps me prolong the battery life in between charges is worth five stars to me. This app definitely does that.
reviews.author: Strength and Power

reviews.title: More then the best
reviews.comment: Good good and the best. Useing this has given my battery all life
reviews.author: gilbert odonkor

reviews.title: Awesome as ****
reviews.comment: Yeah boosted my battery!! Suggestion: 1.put battery % instead of android icon 2.invert settings immediately (Normal to Intellegent)
reviews.author: Chris Andrien Dela cruz

reviews.title: Incredible app
reviews.comment: My Driod DNA could make it a full day with some tweaking of the settings. I can now go almost two days with this app. I\'m very impressed and this app just makes me love my phone that much more.
reviews.author: Lucky Taylor

reviews.title: Great application
reviews.comment: I have only been using this application for a couple of days, but so far I have noticed a significant savings on my battery life.
reviews.author: Kristine Dowhan

reviews.title: Love this app!
reviews.comment: It does everything it claims to do. Preset modes are great for when you only need certain features and maintains a good battery life. Now I don\'t have to charge my phone as often throughout the day. I\'d give it more stars if I could!
reviews.author: A Google User
